narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Chesco Services is a Early Intervention Provider Agency provider based in Chesterfield, SC. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $75.5M in Medicaid payments across 415K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $75.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
